welcome.title: Welcome {{name}}!
welcome.description: I am the official Emperie Nails bot, your assistant to explore all our training options. 💡 I can't answer personalized questions, but I can guide you with these commands: 📚 /courses — View all our available courses. ❓ /help — Learn how to use this bot. Type one of the commands to get started. We're here to help you grow as a professional!

stampingNailMaraton.title: Stamping Art Marathon
stampingNailMaraton.summary: The Stamping Art Marathon is much more than just a challenge or contest: It's an intensive mini-training designed to help you learn techniques, develop your creativity, and increase your visibility as a professional. During the marathon, we'll work together from scratch: 🎨 You’ll learn to master Stamping Art techniques. 🖌️You’ll create unique and professional designs and learn how to take your career one step further. It's not about winning prizes — although there are recognitions for the winners — but about gaining something far more valuable: 💡 knowledge, confidence, and growth in your art. ✨ There are no other speakers here: just you and me, pouring all my experience into you so you can shine. If you want to learn, grow, and enjoy.
